item.title: train of thought
item.description: This morning I was on the train and this super cute bundled child got on the train with what I imagine was her father. it coudln’t havebeen more than 5. since it is cold she was bundled up in such a way that only her mouth, nose and eyes were showing. she was a colorful ball of warm cloth it seemed. soshe and her guardian were standing on the train near me and just chilling.
